node_name: Build and Maintain a Secure Network
definition: Establish and maintain secure network infrastructure protecting cardholder data environment from unauthorized access.
official_pci_description: Per PCI DSS v4.0.1: Establish secure network infrastructure using firewalls, network segmentation, and access controls to protect cardholder data. The goal is to defend the CDE against both external attacks and unauthorized internal access. Network controls must be properly designed, implemented, maintained, and tested.

definition: Implement technical and administrative controls to render cardholder data unreadable and inaccessible to unauthorized parties.
official_pci_description: Per PCI DSS v4.0.1: Protect stored cardholder data from unauthorized access and disclosure. Implement strong encryption, tokenization, truncation, or hashing to render PANs unreadable. Encrypt data in transit. Maintain comprehensive encryption key management. Minimize data storage and retention.
